issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h2. Problem

The [Titanium.UI.PickerColumn.rows|http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.UI.PickerColumn.rows-property.html] property on Android is supposed to be read-only, as with iOS, but currently the developer is able to change it. Hence, this is a parity request.

See [PickerColumnProxy.java|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/master/android/modules/ui/src/java/ti/modules/titanium/ui/PickerColumnProxy.java#L179].

h2. Discussion

See Allen's comment in [this pull request|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/1269/files#r394074].
fields.summary: Android: UI.PickerColumn - make rows property read-only

comments.body: Closing ticket due to time passed and lack of progress for a number of years. Please open a new ticket if there are any problems.
